thig13.1:2.2: Pupphapūra → pupphapūraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | uttamaṅgajo → uttamaṅgabhūto (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); uttamaṅgabhu (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.1:9.3: khaṇḍitā cāsitā → khaṇḍitā ca pītakā (bj), khaṇḍā yavapītakā (sya1ed)
thig13.1:12.3: yatha pāṭalibbalitā → yathā pāṭalippalitā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
